mapper.insert: INSERT INTO doctor_detail (doc_num, hos_num, doc_passwd, doc_email, doc_license, doc_history) VALUES (#{mem_num}, #{hos_num}, #{doc_passwd}, #{doc_email}, #{doc_license, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{doc_history})
mapper.select: SELECT m.mem_num,d.doc_num,m.mem_id,m.mem_auth,m.mem_name,d.hos_num,d.doc_passwd,d.doc_email,d.doc_agree,d.doc_stime,d.doc_etime,d.doc_treat FROM member m LEFT OUTER JOIN doctor_detail d ON m.mem_num = d.doc_num WHERE mem_id=#{mem_id}
